languages.text: "Пленник друкари, возомнивший о себе слишком много. Вместо того, чтобы спокойно сдохнуть на арене, он прячется, собирает вокруг себя других невольников вашей расы и строит убогие планы мести. Многие слушают его — видишь, как мало людишек среди Ревущих? Раньше все они шли ко мне, а теперь, наслушавшись Комиссара, перестали".

"A prisoner of the Drukhari who thinks too highly of himself. Instead of dying in the arena without any fuss, he is hiding, gathering other slaves of your race around him, and making pathetic plans to get his revenge. And many of your kind are listening to him — see how few humanling Shriekers there are? They used to all come to me, but now they listen to the Commissar and no longer come."
languages.original_text: "Пленник друкари, возомнивший о себе слишком много. Вместо того, чтобы спокойно сдохнуть на арене, он прячется, собирает вокруг себя других невольников вашей расы и строит убогие планы мести. Многие слушают его — видишь, как мало людишек среди Ревущих? Раньше все они шли ко мне, а теперь, наслушавшись Комиссара, перестали".

And many of your kind are listening to him — see how few humanling Shriekers there are? They used to all come to me, but now they listen to the Commissar and no longer come."

Instead of dying in the arena without any fuss, he is hiding, gathering other slaves of your race around him, and making pathetic plans to get his revenge. And many of your kind are listening to him — see how few humanling Shriekers there are? They used to all come to me, but now they listen to the Commissar and no longer come."

languages.text: “是个被黑暗灵族俘虏的家伙。那家伙自视甚高，不肯老老实实地死在竞技场上，而是躲了起来，把你们这个种族的其他奴隶聚集在他身边，还制定了可悲的复仇计划。不仅如此，你们之中的许多人都在听他的。只要看看小人儿尖啸者寥寥无几的样子，你就懂了。那些人以前都会来找我，但现在他们都听政委的话，不再过来了。”
languages.original_text: "A prisoner of the Drukhari who thinks too highly of himself. Instead of dying in the arena without any fuss, he is hiding, gathering other slaves of your race around him, and making pathetic plans to get his revenge. And many of your kind are listening to him — see how few humanling Shriekers there are? They used to all come to me, but now they listen to the Commissar and no longer come."

traits.locale_text: “是个被黑暗灵族俘虏的家伙。那家伙自视甚高，不肯老老实实地死在竞技场上，而是躲了起来，把你们这个种族的其他奴隶聚集在他身边，还制定了可悲的复仇计划。不仅如此，你们之中的许多人都在听他的。只要看看小人儿尖啸者寥寥无几的样子，你就懂了。那些人以前都会来找我，但现在他们都听政委的话，不再过来了。”

languages.text: «Un prisionero de los Drukhari con aires de grandeza. En vez de morir en la arena sin rechistar se esconde, reuniendo a otros esclavos de vuestra raza, y tramando una endeble venganza. Y tu gente le hace caso. ¿Ves los pocos Aulladores humanos que hay? Antes venían todos a mí. Pero ahora escuchan al Comisario y no vienen».
languages.original_text: "A prisoner of the Drukhari who thinks too highly of himself. Instead of dying in the arena without any fuss, he is hiding, gathering other slaves of your race around him, and making pathetic plans to get his revenge. And many of your kind are listening to him — see how few humanling Shriekers there are? They used to all come to me, but now they listen to the Commissar and no longer come."

traits.locale_text: «Un prisionero de los Drukhari con aires de grandeza. En vez de morir en la arena sin rechistar se esconde, reuniendo a otros esclavos de vuestra raza, y tramando una endeble venganza. Y tu gente le hace caso. ¿Ves los pocos Aulladores humanos que hay? Antes venían todos a mí. Pero ahora escuchan al Comisario y no vienen».

languages.text: 「デュカーリに囚われている惨めな人間で、自分を高く評価しすぎている。あっさりと闘技場で命を落とさず、どこぞにこそこそと隠れて同じく人間の奴隷を集め、しょうもない復讐を果たそうとしている。大勢の人間が奴の言うことを聞いている――ここには人間のシュリーカーがあまりいないだろう？昔は俺の元に来たものだが、今はコミッサーの言うことしか聞かなくなり、ほとんど見かけなくなった」
languages.original_text: "A prisoner of the Drukhari who thinks too highly of himself. Instead of dying in the arena without any fuss, he is hiding, gathering other slaves of your race around him, and making pathetic plans to get his revenge. And many of your kind are listening to him — see how few humanling Shriekers there are? They used to all come to me, but now they listen to the Commissar and no longer come."

languages.text: "Ein Gefangener der Drukhari, der sich für viel zu wichtig hält. Anstatt ohne Aufhebens in der Arena zu sterben, versteckt er sich, schart andere Sklaven Eures Volks um sich, und schmiedet jämmerliche Rachepläne. Und viele Euresgleichen hören auf ihn — seht Ihr, wie wenige Menschlinge es unter den Kreischern gibt? Früher kamen sie alle zu mir, doch nun hören sie auf den Kommissar und kommen nicht mehr."
languages.original_text: "A prisoner of the Drukhari who thinks too highly of himself. Instead of dying in the arena without any fuss, he is hiding, gathering other slaves of your race around him, and making pathetic plans to get his revenge. And many of your kind are listening to him — see how few humanling Shriekers there are? They used to all come to me, but now they listen to the Commissar and no longer come."

traits.locale_text: "Ein Gefangener der Drukhari, der sich für viel zu wichtig hält. Anstatt ohne Aufhebens in der Arena zu sterben, versteckt er sich, schart andere Sklaven Eures Volks um sich, und schmiedet jämmerliche Rachepläne. Und viele Euresgleichen hören auf ihn — seht Ihr, wie wenige Menschlinge es unter den Kreischern gibt? Früher kamen sie alle zu mir, doch nun hören sie auf den Kommissar und kommen nicht mehr."

languages.text: « Un prisonnier des Drukharis qui se croit plus important qu'il ne l'est vraiment. Plutôt que de mourir dans l'arène sans faire d'histoires, il préfère se cacher, rassembler d'autres esclaves humains et comploter pour se venger. Malheureusement, beaucoup d'individus de votre espèce lui tendent l'oreille... Avez-vous remarqué qu'il y a peu d'humains parmi mes Hurleurs ? À une époque, ils venaient tous à moi, mais aujourd'hui, ils préfèrent écouter le commissaire. »
languages.original_text: "A prisoner of the Drukhari who thinks too highly of himself. Instead of dying in the arena without any fuss, he is hiding, gathering other slaves of your race around him, and making pathetic plans to get his revenge. And many of your kind are listening to him — see how few humanling Shriekers there are? They used to all come to me, but now they listen to the Commissar and no longer come."

traits.locale_text: « Un prisonnier des Drukharis qui se croit plus important qu'il ne l'est vraiment. Plutôt que de mourir dans l'arène sans faire d'histoires, il préfère se cacher, rassembler d'autres esclaves humains et comploter pour se venger. Malheureusement, beaucoup d'individus de votre espèce lui tendent l'oreille... Avez-vous remarqué qu'il y a peu d'humains parmi mes Hurleurs ? À une époque, ils venaient tous à moi, mais aujourd'hui, ils préfèrent écouter le commissaire. »

languages.text: "Drukharilerin tutsağı. Kendini bir şey sanıyor ama arenada ses çıkarmadan öleceğine kuyruğunu kısıp saklandı. Şimdi de ırkınızdan köleler toplayıp zavallıca intikam planları kurmaya çalışıyor. İnsancıklar da ona kulak vermiyor değil. Baksana, Çığırtkanlarım arasında tek tük insancık var. Eskiden hepsi benim ayağıma gelirdi. Şimdilerde Komiser'e kulak asıyor, buralara uğramıyorlar."
languages.original_text: "A prisoner of the Drukhari who thinks too highly of himself. Instead of dying in the arena without any fuss, he is hiding, gathering other slaves of your race around him, and making pathetic plans to get his revenge. And many of your kind are listening to him — see how few humanling Shriekers there are? They used to all come to me, but now they listen to the Commissar and no longer come."
